source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a scenery shot showing the aftermath of an incident at the Pentagon. Thick smoke billows from the side of the building, where emergency vehicles are gathered. In the foreground, a minivan drives past on a highway, and people are seen on the lawn between the road and the building.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.initial_feedback:
A silver minivan is parked next to the roadside railing, but not moving.
Two cars are seen driving past one after the other from right to left in the foreground.
the few people on the lawn are walking from left to right.
source_caption_data.gpt_feedback: The silver minivan is parked next to the roadside railing and is stationary. Two cars are driving past in the foreground, moving from right to left. Meanwhile, a few people on the lawn are walking from left to right.
source_caption_data.final_feedback: The silver minivan is parked next to the roadside railing and is stationary. Two cars are driving past in the foreground, moving from right to left. Meanwhile, a few people on the lawn are walking from left to right.

source_caption_data.final_caption: Thick smoke billows from the side of the Pentagon, where emergency vehicles are gathered. A silver minivan is parked next to the roadside railing, stationary, while two cars drive past in the foreground, moving from right to left. Meanwhile, a few people on the lawn are walking from left to right.

generated_critique: The caption inaccurately describes the motion of the people on the lawn. It states that "a few people on the lawn are walking from left to right," but the video shows one person in a light-colored shirt standing mostly stationary while another person in dark clothing walks slowly from left to right. The description should be corrected to accurately reflect these individual actions instead of generalizing the movement of the group.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This is a scenery shot showing the aftermath of an incident at the Pentagon. Thick smoke billows from the side of the building, where emergency vehicles are gathered. In the foreground, a minivan drives past on a highway. On the lawn between the road and the building, a person in a light-colored shirt stands mostly still, while another person in dark clothing walks in the background.
